txt.en: Crashed kites can be found throughout Hobbiton.\n\nYou should collect the crashed kites so that other festival patrons may enjoy them.

‘The kites are a delightful addition to the Festival, but there have been a number of incidents of crashes. It seems that folks aren't terribly deft at kite-flying in these parts.\n\n'Would you be so good as to search Hobbiton for crashed kites and return them to me?’
Lila Roper can be found at the party tree in Hobbiton.\n\nYou should bring Lila Roper the crashed kites.
Many kites have crash-landed all over Hobbiton, and must be picked up.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the event it is associated with ends.</rgb>
Bring the crashed kites to Lila Roper
'Thank you! It would have been such a shame if these went missing. Now more patrons can enjoy them during the Lithe Days!'
